title: Google\Cloud\Batch\V1\LogsPolicy
name: LogsPolicy
description:
LogsPolicy describes how outputs from a Job's Tasks (stdout/stderr) will be preserved.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.batch.v1.LogsPolicy

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.logs_path
params.description: The path to which logs are saved when the destination = PATH. This can be a local file path on the VM, or under the mount point of a Persistent Disk or Filestore, or a Cloud Storage path.

methods.description:
